title: Chain Cloud: A decentralized copyright trading platform
text:
• Key platform features include: blockchain-based copyright evidence storage, smart contract-driven copyright transactions, multidimensional data analytics and visualization, regulatory auditing, and traceability queries.
• Blockchain: Developed smart contract chain codes based on Hyperledger Fabric to implement copyright evidence storage, automated transaction execution, and revenue distribution logic, ensuring tamper-proof and fully traceable transaction data.
• Data Storage: Designed a hybrid storage architecture storing critical transaction hashes on-chain while managing business data off-chain via MySQL and storing image/document files using Huawei Cloud OBS, balancing performance and security requirements.
• Backend: Designed and implemented the backend architecture for a blockchain-based smart copyright trading platform. Built high-performance RESTful APIs using Golang + Hertz microservices framework to support core functions including copyright registration on-chain, transaction execution, and regulatory review. Implemented a comprehensive permission control system encompassing user registration/login, JWT authentication, and regulatory review. Utilized WebSocket calls to large models for AI-assisted Q&A.

title: Zhiqing Ma
text:
Abstract
In a complete theory there is an element corresponding to each element of reality. A sufficient condition for the reality of a physical quantity is the possibility of predicting it with certainty, without disturbing the system. In quantum mechanics in the case of two physical quantities described by non-commuting operators, the knowledge of one precludes the knowledge of the other. Then either (1) the description of reality given by the wave function in quantum mechanics is not complete or (2) these two quantities cannot have simultaneous reality. Consideration of the problem of making predictions concerning a system on the basis of measurements made on another system that had previously interacted with it leads to the result that if (1) is false then (2) is also false. One is thus led to conclude that the description of reality as given by a wave function is not complete.

title: Holistic Ecosystem Dynamics with Lampreys Considering Age Structure and Diffusion Terms
text:
• Key project features include: quantification of sex ratio functions, simulation of parasite diffusion using spectral methods, and a robust numerical solver for non-trivial equilibrium systems.
• Data Analysis & Pre-processing: Cleaned historical observation data and quantified the key “sex ratio function” by conducting comparative analysis between Polynomial Regression and SVM (Support Vector Machines), establishing the statistical foundation for the ecosystem model.
• Core Simulation Engine: Designed and implemented a solver based on the Finite Difference Method to handle the complex ODE-PDE coupling model. Introduced the Dirac Delta function to accurately mathematically express biological pulses within the ecosystem.
• Optimization & Stability: Implemented the Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm and Trust Domain Policy Optimization (TRPO) to solve for non-trivial equilibrium, ensuring numerical convergence where traditional black-box tools failed. Applied the Chebyshev spectral method to simulate the diffusion effect of parasites with high accuracy.
